full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/24/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUS E Form approved Immigration and Naturalization Servic OMB No. 43-R423 AFFIDAVIT OF SUPPORT (ANSWER ALL ITEMS: FILL IN WITH TYPEWRITER OR PRINT IN BLOCK LETTERS IN INK.) I, RUTH CHENG MATHEY residing at 1405 ROSEHILL DR (Name) (Street and number) RIVERSIDE CA 92507 USA (City) (State) (ZIP Code, If in U.S.) (Country) being duly sworn depose and say: 1. I was born on JAN4, 45 at PEIKING CHINA Also, answer either a, b or c, as appro- (Date) (City) (Country) priate, if you are not a native born United States citizen. (a) If a United States citizen through naturalization, give number of certificate of naturalization (b) If a United States citizen through parent(s) or marriage, give number of own certificate of citizenship If none obtained, attach statement explaining how citizenship derived. (c) If an alien lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence, give 'A' number FOIA (b)(6) 2. That I am 32 years of age and have resided in the United States since JAN 1970 3. That this affidavit is executed in behalf of the following person(s) at present residing at 1405 ROSEHILL DR, RIVERSIDE CA 92507 NAME SEX AGE COUNTRY OF BIRTH MARRIED OR RELATIONSHIP TO SINGLE DEPONENT CHING-HSING CHENG 63 CHINA M. FATHER 4. (Amounts shown in answer to this question must be in United States dollars.) (a) That I am employed as, or engaged in the business of ACCTS PAyablE with CONTAINER CORP OF 185 N. Smith, CORONA. CA 91720 (Name of concern) AMERICA at and derive a net annual income of $ 8,940 (b) That I have on deposit in savings (Address) banks in this country 3,100. (c) That I have other personal property, the reasonable value of which is $ (d) That I have stocks and bonds in the amount of $ N/A , market value, as indicated on attached list which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (e) That I own real estate at 1405 ROSEHILL RIVERS DEVALUED at $50,000 with mortgages or other encumbrances there- on amounting to $ 44,000 (f) That I have life insurance in the sum of $ N/A , cash surrender value of $ N/A (g) That if self-employed, I attach a copy of my last income tax return or report of commer- cial rating concern which I certify to be true and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief. (See reverse side for nature of evidence of net worth to be submitted) 5. That the following persons are dependent upon me for support: (Place a check in the appropriate column to indicate whether the person named is wholly or partially dependent upon you for support.) NAME OF PERSON WHOLLY PARTIALLY AGE RELATIONSHIP TO ME DEPENDENT DEPENDENT CHING-HSING CHENG 63 FATHER Form 1-134 (Rev. 5-31-72) N
